forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. Southwest wind 3 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the early morning greets Downtown San Francisco, a gentle calm envelops the city, promising a day that dances between clarity and the playful hints of marine influence. The predicted sunshine, peeking through the clouds, will usher a mellow warmth, ideal for those wandering the streets or finding solace in the local cafés. With temperatures lingering in the low sixties, there’s an invitation for light layers—a cozy sweater or a light jacket would serve well against the subtle, refreshing breeze blowing in from the west.

Expect the day to unfold enchantingly, with hints of warmth tempered by a caress of cool air. As the afternoon progresses, any lingering fog should recede, allowing striking views that stretch all the way to the Golden Gate. The mild temperatures will encourage leisurely strolls through Golden Gate Park or quiet moments on a bench with a book. As night merges softly into the day, the skies will don a more subdued palette, perfect for winding down with a serene walk or a quiet dinner, perhaps near the waterfront. In this blend of warmth and coolness, there lies a beauty in the balance—a vivid reminder of what makes San Francisco a timeless wonder.
